verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> there <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> that <S%G5607>was<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1320>teachers<s%>; <S%G5037>as<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4826>Simeon<s%> that was <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G3526>Niger<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3066>Lucius<s%> of <S%G2956>Cyrene<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G3127>Manaen<s%>, which had been brought <S%G4939>up<s%> with <S%G2264>Herod<s%> the <S%G5076>tetrarch<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4569>Saul<s%>. which: or, Herod's foster brother

<S%G1161>As<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G3008>ministered<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3522>fasted<s%>, the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%><S%G1211>,<s%> <S%G873>Separate<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G5037><s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4569>Saul<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G3739>whereunto<s%> I have <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G5119>And<s%> when they had <S%G3522>fasted<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4336>prayed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2007>laid<s%> their <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G2007>on<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, they sent them <S%G630>away<s%>.

<S%G3303>So<s%> <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3778>they<s%>, being sent <S%G1599>forth<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%>, <S%G2718>departed<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4581>Seleucia<s%>; and <S%G1564>from<s%> <S%G5037>thence<s%> they <S%G636>sailed<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2954>Cyprus<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when they <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G4529>Salamis<s%>, they <S%G2605>preached<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> to their <S%G5257>minister<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when they had gone <S%G1330>through<s%> the <S%G3520>isle<s%> <S%G891>unto<s%> <S%G3974>Paphos<s%>, they <S%G2147>found<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3097>sorcerer<s%>, a false <S%G5578>prophet<s%>, a <S%G2453>Jew<s%>, <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> was <S%G919>Barjesus<s%>:

<S%G3739>Which<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> the deputy of the <S%G446>country<s%>, <S%G4588>Sergius<s%> <S%G3972>Paulus<s%>, a <S%G4908>prudent<s%> <S%G435>man<s%>; <S%G3778>who<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> for <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4569>Saul<s%>, and <S%G1934>desired<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1681>Elymas<s%> the <S%G3097>sorcerer<s%> <S%G1063>(for<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> is <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> by <S%G3177>interpretation<s%>) <S%G436>withstood<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2212>seeking<s%> to turn <S%G1294>away<s%> the <S%G446>deputy<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G4569>Saul<s%>, <S%G3588>(who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> is called <S%G3972>Paul<s%>,) filled <S%G4130>with<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%><S%G2532>,<s%> set his <S%G816>eyes<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>,

And <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G5599>O<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1388>subtilty<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4468>mischief<s%>, thou <S%G5207>child<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil<s%>, thou <S%G2190>enemy<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>, wilt <S%G3973>thou<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3973>cease<s%> to <S%G1294>pervert<s%> the <S%G2117>right<s%> <S%G3598>ways<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>?

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, the <S%G5495>hand<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> thou shalt <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G5185>blind<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G991>seeing<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%> <S%G891>for<s%> a <S%G2540>season<s%>. <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3916>immediately<s%> there <S%G1968>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G887>mist<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G4655>darkness<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he went <S%G4013>about<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> some to lead him by the <S%G5497>hand<s%>.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G446>deputy<s%>, when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> what was <S%G1096>done<s%>, <S%G4100>believed<s%>, being <S%G1605>astonished<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G1322>doctrine<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and his <S%G4012>company<s%> <S%G321>loosed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3974>Paphos<s%>, they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4011>Perga<s%> in <S%G3828>Pamphylia<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G672>departing<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> when <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G1330>departed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G4011>Perga<s%>, they <S%G3854>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%> in <S%G4099>Pisidia<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1525>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> on the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>, and sat <S%G2523>down<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G320>reading<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> the rulers of the <S%G752>synagogue<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Ye <S%G435>men<s%> and <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G1487>if<s%> ye <S%G2076>have<s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5213><s%> any <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G3874>exhortation<s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%>, say <S%G3004>on<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> stood <S%G450>up<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2678>beckoning<s%> with his <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G435>Men<s%> of <S%G2475>Israel<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> ye that <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, give <S%G191>audience<s%>.

The <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G1586>chose<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>fathers<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5312>exalted<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G1722>when<s%> they dwelt as <S%G3940>strangers<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G125>Egypt<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> an <S%G5308>high<s%> <S%G1023>arm<s%> brought <S%G1806>he<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5613>about<s%> the <S%G5550>time<s%> of forty <S%G5063>years<s%> suffered <S%G5159>he<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5159>manners<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%>. suffered: or bore, or fed them as a nurse beareth, or feedeth, her child

<S%G2532>And<s%> when he had <S%G2507>destroyed<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G5477>Chanaan<s%>, he <S%G2624>divided<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1093>land<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%> by <S%G2624>lot<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5023>that<s%> he <S%G1325>gave<s%> unto them <S%G2923>judges<s%> <S%G5613>about<s%> the space of four <S%G5071>hundred<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4004>fifty<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%>, <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G4545>Samuel<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%>.

And <S%G2547>afterward<s%> they <S%G154>desired<s%> a <S%G935>king<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4549>Saul<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G2797>Cis<s%>, a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G958>Benjamin<s%>, by the space of <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when he had <S%G3179>removed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, he raised <S%G1453>up<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> to <S%G1519>be<s%> their <S%G935>king<s%>; to <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> he gave <S%G3140>testimony<s%>, and <S%G2036>said<s%>, I have <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> the son of <S%G2421>Jesse<s%>, a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> mine <S%G3450>own<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> shall <S%G4160>fulfil<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2307>will<s%>.

<S%G575>Of<s%> this <S%G5127>man's<s%> <S%G4690>seed<s%> <S%G1453>hath<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to his <S%G1860>promise<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> unto <S%G2474>Israel<s%> a <S%G4990>Saviour<s%>, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>:

When <S%G2491>John<s%> had first <S%G4296>preached<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4383>coming<s%> <S%G1529><s%> the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> his <S%G1408>course<s%>, he <S%G3004>said<s%>, <S%G5101>Whom<s%> think <S%G5282>ye<s%> that <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G1511>am<s%>? <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> he. <S%G235>But<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, there cometh <S%G2064>one<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%>, <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5266>shoes<s%> of his <S%G4228>feet<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> to <S%G3089>loose<s%>.

<S%G435>Men<s%> and <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G5207>children<s%> of the <S%G1085>stock<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> whosoever <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G5399>feareth<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G649>is<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> they that <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G758>rulers<s%>, because they <S%G50>knew<s%> <S%G5126>him<s%> <S%G50>not<s%>, nor <S%G2532>yet<s%> the <S%G5456>voices<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%>, they have <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> them in <S%G2919>condemning<s%> him.

<S%G2532>And<s%> though they <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G156>cause<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> in him, yet desired <S%G154>they<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> should be <S%G337>slain<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> they had <S%G5055>fulfilled<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> that was <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, they took him <S%G2507>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3586>tree<s%>, and <S%G5087>laid<s%> him <S%G1519>in<s%> a <S%G3419>sepulchre<s%>.
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>:

And <S%G3739>he<s%> was <S%G3700>seen<s%> <S%G1909>many<s%> <S%G4119><s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> of them which came up <S%G4872>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2097>declare<s%> unto <S%G5209>you<s%> glad <S%G2097>tidings<s%>, how <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> which was <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> the <S%G3962>fathers<s%>,

<S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G1603>fulfilled<s%> the <S%G5026>same<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%>, in that he hath raised <S%G450>up<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G450>again<s%>; <S%G5613>as<s%> it <S%G1125>is<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G5568>psalm<s%>, <S%G4771>Thou<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%>, this <S%G4594>day<s%> have <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1080>begotten<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> as concerning <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G450>raised<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G450>up<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>, now no <S%G3371>more<s%> <S%G3195>to<s%> <S%G5290>return<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1312>corruption<s%>, he <S%G2046>said<s%> on this <S%G3779>wise<s%><S%G3754>,<s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> the <S%G4103>sure<s%> <S%G3741>mercies<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%>. mercies: Gr. holy, or just things: which word the Septuagint in many places, uses for that which is in the Hebrew, mercies

<S%G1352>Wherefore<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> psalm, Thou <S%G1325>shalt<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1325>suffer<s%> <S%G4675>thine<s%> Holy <S%G3741>One<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G1312>corruption<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G1138>David<s%>, after he had <S%G5256>served<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> by the <S%G1012>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, fell on <S%G2837>sleep<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G4369>laid<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3962>fathers<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G1312>corruption<s%>: after: or, after he had in his own age served the will of God
<S%G1161>But<s%> he, <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> raised <S%G1453>again<s%>, <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1312>corruption<s%>.

Be <S%G2077>it<s%> <S%G1110>known<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, <S%G435>men<s%> and <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> this <S%G5127>man<s%> is <S%G2605>preached<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> the <S%G859>forgiveness<s%> of <S%G266>sins<s%>:
